props.title: Operations per second
props.hint: Number of INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE and DELETE statements executed per seconds.
props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.query.insertPerSecond`) as 'Insert commands', average(`mysql.node.query.selectPerSecond`) as 'Select commands', average(`mysql.node.query.updatePerSecond`) as 'Update comands', average(`mysql.node.query.deletePerSecond`) as 'Delete commands' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Queries per second
props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.query.queriesPerSecond`) as 'Queries' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Slow queries per minute
props.hint: Number of slow queries per minute.
props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.query.slowQueriesPerSecond`) * 60 as 'Slow queries' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Active connections
props.query: SELECT latest(`mysql.node.net.threadsConnected`) as 'Active connections' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}'

props.title: Max connections
props.query: SELECT max(`mysql.node.net.threadsConnected`) as 'Max connections' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Read and written InnoDB bytes per second
props.hint: Rate at which data is read and written from InnoDB tables in bytes per second.
props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.innodb.dataReadBytesPerSecond`) as 'Read InnoDB data', average(`mysql.node.innodb.dataWrittenBytesPerSecond`) as 'Write InnoDB data' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Received and sent bytes per second
props.hint: Byte throughput received and sent from all clients, per second.
props.query: SELECT average(`mysql.node.net.bytesReceivedPerSecond`) as 'Bytes received', average(`mysql.node.net.bytesSentPerSecond`) as 'Bytes sent' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
